text: @realDonaldTrump @AlexAzar ICHEOKU says in fact nobody is doing any “excellent” job with this many deaths, the highest in the world. America’s greatness is seriously under the microscope as coronavirus has exposed America as over hyped. It is sad. #InvestigateTheCoronavirus spread, management and treatment
